title: Pocket Cinema Camera 6K Partial Assembly
credit_line: Courtesy Blackmagic Design, Major Partner of ACMI
brief_description:
This partially assembled Pocket Cinema Camera displays some of the design detail required to achieve accurate, highly toleranced fitment of parts.
Internal components have been miniaturised to ensure the camera is compact enough for hand-held use, but capable of delivering cinematic film quality.
